storyInfo: Having spent what seemed to be an eternity in Sargon, Elliot now stands before Kal'tsit once again. Fate has been cruel, in spite of the old cliche that fate works in mysterious ways.

attributes.content: Hey, come check this out. We got ourselves a new lackey! You, stop lazing around. Go!
attributes.name: Black Market Merchant

attributes.content: I'm the new craftsman apprentice. My name's Elâ€”
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Alright, enough talk. Get moving!
attributes.name: Black Market Merchant

attributes.content: Hey, you lot! Use him however you want. He's apparently one of those bookworm types from Columbia, even younger than your kids!
attributes.name: Black Market Merchant

attributes.content: Just treat him like those slaves that got sold to us. As long as it doesn't kill him, that is. It's not like he's got a guardian angel watching his back.
attributes.name: Black Market Merchant

attributes.content: We'll work you to bone, kid.
attributes.name: Black Market Merchant

attributes.content: Alright...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Isin, look!
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Oh... What a surprise. Did you weld this together with the steel you stole? What a magnificent piece.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: You're exaggerating. It doesn't matter how pretty it is; it's just consumables.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: But you must rest. Your broken arm has only just healed...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Don't worry.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Do you know where we can get some refined Originium?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: There is nothing that gold cannot buy in the Reefsteep Black Market.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Let's see how this turns out, then...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: The black scorpion is dead...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: We've done well, haven't we?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Old Isin heard from the fence today... The 'Sand Soldier' is the next ruler of Reefsteep.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Do you think you are? Elliot?
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: And do you wish me to be, Isin?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: I'm not one to forget the kindness others have shown me. If it wasn't for you, I would not have survived these past two decades.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Now you need Old Isin no more...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: No... Hardly. We have a special relationship, after all.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: But if you wanted to complain, perhaps you should complain to that lady who cloaked herself in all those mysteries.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Kal'tsit...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: You still remember her name. You've gotten less and less clear-headed over the years. I thought you'd have forgotten that, among many other things.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Have you looked for her?
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Yes, I have, but my attempts have been futile. Not even my most elite intelligence agents could find any information about her in Columbia. Besides, the PMC disbanded not long after that.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: The laboratory was taken over by the military, and all of their data were destroyed. I could not find even a single participant... Columbia hid them well.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: The Ibuti Lord Ameer will pass through Redhorn next week. Hoh, fate can be a fickle mistress sometimes.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: This is an excellent opportunityâ€”Old Isin, are you asleep?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Old Isin had a dream...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Another one of your dreams?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: It was still the same dream as always... The Kheshig's footsteps went across the tundra and grasslands, at last reaching the land of golden sands.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: But, this time, the dream was a little different...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: It was a scenery that the padishah never recounted to Old Isin... There was someone there... She looked like... like Kal'tsit... in another form.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Hm.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: She was there.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: When the Kheshigs' conquest shattered that bygone era all those thousands of years ago... she was there...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Dreams can't explain much, and there are no Arts that allow us to glimpse into our fate across time. You said so yourself.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Yes... This is merely a dream that Old Isin had... a meaningless dream... Lady Kal'tsit could not have had anything to do with them... but it does make Old Isin wonder if there is meaning to this dream.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: At the very end, Old Isin saw the padishah.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Oh? And what did your master tell you this time, old faithful?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: He...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: In my dream... he told Old Isin... where Sargon is...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: You are planning to ambush the lord ameer's squadron.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: So you mean to tell me that you, a former faithful aide to a Sargon noble, will stop me from disrespecting a lord ameer so?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: â€”Disrespect?
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Hm.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: They are rotten and incompetent. They only know to bootlessly harm their kin and drag innocent Sargonians into war...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: They stand on Reefsteep's land, doing their dirty work. Why would Old Isin feel respect for men like them?
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Old Isin wants them to pay the price. Old Isin wants the glory of Sargon's past be restored, and not by these good-for-nothing clowns!
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Old Isin... Right... Old Isin must seek the city of golden sands!
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: I don't see you get this excited often. Please, calm downâ€”
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: It's time...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Go, my child. Light a fire, and complete your revenge.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Until the time comes when the winds finally calm and the eternal city rises from the sandstorm... Old Isin will wait... and Old Isin will reach that place...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: This is the place...
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Passenger

attributes.content: Be sure to knock first.
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Don't get any funny ideas. The elite operators here ain't no pushovers.
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Now go.
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Looks like that gold coin made it to you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: How is Old Isin?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: He's lost to the golden sands... It happened one moonlit night three years ago.
attributes.name: Passenger

attributes.content: Time. Time can put to rest even a Savra like him. I almost thought him to be one of the ancient, elder beings in folk tales and conspiracy theories.
attributes.name: Passenger

attributes.content: Time has warped me so much, transforming me into a man my past self would have hated.
attributes.name: Passenger

attributes.content: And you, Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Passenger

attributes.content: It looks like... nothing about you has changed.
attributes.name: Passenger

attributes.content: Are you still the 'Sand Soldier?'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I already said this when I came onboard. That is all in the past. I have a new name now.
attributes.name: Passenger

attributes.content: You can fool yourself... but you can't fool me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Perhaps. You've always thought everything you said was absolute, and unfortunately for me, you were quite often right.
attributes.name: Passenger

attributes.content: You have always had a good memory, Elliot.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Don't call me by that name... Don't we have these codenames exactly for this purpose, to shroud our secrets?
attributes.name: Passenger

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsitâ€”Oh, my apologies. Do you have a visitor?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: No matter.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Please, as you were.
attributes.name: Passenger

attributes.content: Okay...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: A Messenger from the field office in Victoria sent us a package. It's pretty strange, too. It's not addressed to Rhodes Island, but you personally. Logistics has already scanned the package. There's an information storage device inside.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: The sender's name is... Heidi Thomson. Do you know her?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: This is just some intel I needed. Leave it there.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Okay... that is all.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: A new conspiracy, I presume?
attributes.name: Passenger

attributes.content: Watch your mouth. You may not officially be an operator here yet, but you signed a contract.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Exactly what I expected our 'Operations Adviser' to say.
attributes.name: Passenger

attributes.content: Kal'tsit, you pointed Old Isin to a new direction, and for that he was forever grateful up until the moment he set out on his journey again.
attributes.name: Passenger

attributes.content: I cannot begin to imagine the glory you two shared, but now that my business in Sargon has been taken care of, there is nothing that binds me to this world anymore...
attributes.name: Passenger

attributes.content: I suppose you will point me in a new direction as well?
attributes.name: Passenger

attributes.content: Before that... Let me introduce you to someone.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Here I thought you would keep me close to you. Did you get me a partner?
attributes.name: Passenger

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Your commanding officer.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: A Rhodes Island commander? You... Hoh... There is someone whom you trust so deeply here? I look forward to meeting this person, then.
attributes.name: Passenger

attributes.content: Kal'tsit...
attributes.name: Passenger

attributes.content: You wandered the world for so long. How long will you stay here this time?
attributes.name: Passenger

attributes.content: You have no right to ask.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Very well, of course. You needn't answer if you don't want to, as you are now my superior.
attributes.name: Passenger

attributes.content: But if this is yet another false identity, and this place where you belong is yet again false, then I am afraid it would hardly be meaningful for me to serve this place.
attributes.name: Passenger

attributes.content: How am I to tell you are not using me yet again?
attributes.name: Passenger

attributes.content: You have the right to be suspicious...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I need only a little assurance. Will this 'Kal'tsit' who invited me here disappear all of a sudden in a few days, a few months, or perhaps a few years?
attributes.name: Passenger

attributes.content: Will she again set off on a journey to take care of some business that a bystander could never come to understand, to drift the world for her own purposes?
attributes.name: Passenger

attributes.content: Will you?
attributes.name: Passenger

attributes.content: If a simple answer can affect your loyalty to Rhodes Island, then perhaps I must reevaluate this working relationship of ours.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I only need an answer. An answer should not be so hard for you. I'll even accept a lie.
attributes.name: Passenger

attributes.content: If it is answers that you want, I have thousands of them.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Then, please, pick any one of them.
attributes.name: Passenger

attributes.content: Iâ€”
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, here you are.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Closure has finished resupplying, but there seems to be an emergency there that needs your attention. Amiya is heading there already.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Don't keep her waiting. She has been working very hard, and you should be there at her side when she needs you the most.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Of course... That goes for you as well.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Don't push yourself too hard. Rhodes Island needs you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I have an unexpected consultation to attend to in a moment, so I will leave it to you and Amiya to wrap things up.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If things go well, perhaps we will get to announce to the whole ship before sundownâ€”
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: â€”Time to set sail.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit
